name: text-utilities-mcp
description: A powerful MCP server providing text manipulation tools including reverse, uppercase, lowercase, word count, character count, and shuffle operations
long_description:
This MCP Bundle provides a comprehensive set of text manipulation utilities for AI assistants. It includes tools for:

- **Text Transformation**: Reverse text, convert to uppercase/lowercase
- **Text Analysis**: Count words and characters
- **Fun Operations**: Shuffle text randomly using Fisher-Yates algorithm

All tools are designed to work locally with minimal latency and no external dependencies.

tools.name: reverse_text
tools.description: Reverses the order of characters in the given text

tools.name: word_count
tools.description: Counts the number of words in the given text

tools.name: character_count
tools.description: Counts the number of characters (including spaces) in the given text

tools.name: shuffle_text
tools.description: Randomly shuffles the characters in the given text using Fisher-Yates algorithm
